name: Mega Man
title: Defender of Civilization at Light Laboratories
bio: Mega Man, also known as Rock Man, is a robot created by Dr Light in AD 200X. From time to time he is required to save the world from Dr. Wily's evil robot masters. He used to think "Don't Stop Believing" was a lame karaoke song choice because it was too on-the-nose, but then he saw the Sopranos finale and changed his mind.
